original_text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him.
korean_text: 내가 진실로 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 종이 주인보다 크지 못하고 보냄을 받은 자가 보낸 자보다 크지 못하나니

sentences.original_text: Verily, verily, I say unto you
The servant is not greater than his lord
neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him
sentences.korean_translation: 보냄을 받은 자도 보낸 자보다 크지 아니하니라
